items.text: We start the thread which triggers the run method which was a part of the Runnable interface that we’ve implemented.
items.href: Android Media Player Song With SeekBar - JournalDev

items.text: Inside the run method, we update the progress every second which triggers the onProgressChanged method of the SeekBar listener.
items.href: Android Media Player Song With SeekBar - JournalDev

items.text: When the user stops scrubbing the SeekBar the onStopTrackingTouch is triggered in which using the seekTo method we update the song position on the MediaPlayer instance.
items.href: Android Media Player Song With SeekBar - JournalDev

items.text: seekTo(position) – This will be used with the SeekBar
items.href: Android Media Player Song With SeekBar - JournalDev
